<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_attachment</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Restrict no. of attachment on incident</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    // Check if the record is related to the Incident table
    if (current.table_name == 'incident') {
        // Set the max number of attachments allowed
        var maxAttachments = 3;

        // Create a GlideRecord to query sys_attachment for the current incident record
        var attachmentCount = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
        attachmentCount.addQuery('table_sys_id', current.table_sys_id); // Sys_id of the related incident record
        attachmentCount.query();

        var count = 0;
        // Count how many attachments there are for the incident
        while (attachmentCount.next()) {
            count++;
        }

        // If the number of attachments exceeds the allowed limit, prevent the operation
        if (count >= maxAttachments) {
            // Add an error message to the UI
            gs.addErrorMessage("You cannot attach more than " + maxAttachments + " files to an incident.");
            current.setAbortAction(true);
        }
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-05 05:14:27</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5dfc4cbdc34112101bf11dd1b4013140</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Restrict no. of attachment on incident</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5dfc4cbdc34112101bf11dd1b4013140</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-05 05:15:39</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5dfc4cbdc34112101bf11dd1b4013140"/></record_update>
